member.name: T:CMS.DataCom.Web.UI.DataComForm
member.summary: Provides UI elements to display and edit CMS contact (or account) and possibly update if from the specified Data.com contact (or company).

member.name: F:CMS.DataCom.Web.UI.DataComForm.mItems
member.summary: A dictionary of form field name/form item pairs.

member.name: F:CMS.DataCom.Web.UI.DataComForm.mEntity
member.summary: A Data.com entity.

member.name: F:CMS.DataCom.Web.UI.DataComForm.mMergeHint
member.summary: A value indicating whether this control should suggest entity attributes suitable for CMS object update.

member.name: F:CMS.DataCom.Web.UI.DataComForm.mMergeHintAttributes
member.summary: An array of form field names that are the object of the merge hint.

member.name: F:CMS.DataCom.Web.UI.DataComForm.mFormatter
member.summary: An object that formats values of Data.com contact (or company) attributes.

member.name: M:CMS.DataCom.Web.UI.DataComForm.Restore(CMS.Base.IDataContainer)
member.summary: Provides the form fields with the values from the specified CMS contact (or account).

member.name: M:CMS.DataCom.Web.UI.DataComForm.Store
member.summary: Saves the values of the form fields to the CMS contact (or account) assigned to this forms and returns the value indicating whether the operation was successful.
member.returns: True if the operation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:CMS.DataCom.Web.UI.DataComForm.Validate
member.summary: Validates the form fields and returns the value indicating whether validation was successful.
member.returns: True if validation was successful; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:CMS.DataCom.Web.UI.DataComForm.Merge
member.summary: Merges the Data.com contact (or company) attribute values with the CMS contact (or account) form field values according to the user choice.

member.summary: OnPreRender event.

member.summary: This method is overridden for a specific purpose and shouldn't be changed.

member.summary: This method is overridden for a specific purpose and shouldn't be changed.

member.summary: This method is overridden for a specific purpose and shouldn't be changed.

member.name: M:CMS.DataCom.Web.UI.DataComForm.MergeFormState
member.summary: Updates the form fields values with the selected Data.com contact (or company) attribute values, and returns a dictionary of form field name/original value pairs.
member.returns: A dictionary of form field name/original value pairs.

member.summary: Restores the form field values to the specified values.
